title: Public Resource Hub Rendering and Navigation
description: Verify that the public resource hub page loads correctly, displays categorized resources with icons and colors, and supports navigation without login.

steps.description: Navigate to the public homepage resource hub as a guest user.
Verify the page loads with no errors and all resource categories are displayed.
Check that each category displays an icon and color consistent with the admin settings.
Click on a resource category link.
Verify navigation to the resource list or detail page without requiring login.
Resize the browser window to test responsive layout on multiple device widths.
Ensure resource hub layout adapts correctly and remains usable on mobile and desktop screens.

title: AI Chat Assistant Widget Basic Flow and Rate Limit Handling
description: Test the AI Chat Assistant floating button opens the chat panel, allows messaging, handles API failures and rate limits with retry logic and user notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to any public page containing the AI Chat Assistant floating button.
Confirm the floating button is visible and clickable.
Click the AI Chat Assistant floating button to open the chat panel.
Verify the chat panel opens smoothly with animation.
Send a valid query message relevant to campus info.
Check the AI response is received and displayed in the chat panel.
Simulate API rate limiting from the backend /api/chat endpoint.
Confirm the widget performs retry with backoff and shows a meaningful retry or error message after retry limit reached.
Close and reopen the chat panel.
Verify previous chat history is preserved or cleared as per requirements.

title: Role-Based Authentication and Protected Route Access
description: Validate username-only login functionality supports all roles (ADMIN, HELPER, IT_PREFECT, STUDENT, GUEST) with correct redirection and authorization enforcement on protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Attempt login with a valid ADMIN username.
Verify successful login and redirection to ADMIN dashboard.
Attempt login with a valid IT_PREFECT username.
Verify successful login and redirection to IT Prefect Hub dashboard.
Attempt access to an admin-only page while logged in as IT_PREFECT.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown unauthorized page.
Logout.
Try to access a protected route without login.
Verify user is redirected to login page.
Attempt login with an invalid username.
Verify login failure message is shown.

title: Admin Console Category and Resource Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify the admin UI for creating, reading, updating, and deleting resource categories and resources including icon and color pickers with validation and error handling.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN.
Navigate to category management UI.
Create a new resource category with valid name, select an icon and color.
Verify the new category appears in the list instantly with correct icon and color.
Attempt to create a category with a duplicate name.
Verify validation error message is displayed preventing duplicate category.
Edit an existing category's icon and color.
Verify changes reflect immediately in the UI and database.
Delete a category that has associated resources.
Verify appropriate confirmation is requested and cascading effects or error handling occur.
Navigate to resource management for a category.
Create, update, and delete resource entries verifying real-time UI update.
Confirm validations on resource fields and error handling on failures.

title: Training Library Multi-Type Resource Handling
description: Validate the IT Prefect training library functionality supporting video, rich text, and file upload resources for listing, viewing, and downloading with correct permissions.

steps.description: Login as IT_PREFECT.
Navigate to training library dashboard.
Verify the list of training resources includes videos, text documents, and files.
Select a video resource and play it.
Verify video plays smoothly without errors.
Select a rich text training resource and verify all formatted content is rendered correctly.
Download a file resource.
Confirm the file downloads completely and is openable.
Attempt to upload a new training resource with an invalid file format.
Verify validation errors are shown and upload is blocked.
Upload a valid training resource file.
Verify resource appears in the library immediately after upload.

title: IT Prefect Hub Dashboard Functionalities
description: Verify that IT prefect users can access the hub dashboard to view internal communications, tasks, event calendar, and training materials with real-time data updates.

steps.description: Login as IT_PREFECT user.
Navigate to the IT Prefect Hub dashboard.
Verify internal communication messages are displayed with timestamps.
Verify the task list shows assigned tasks with statuses and deadlines.
Check event calendar shows upcoming events with RSVP status.
Update a task status if permitted.
Confirm status updates in UI and backend.
Select a training material link from the dashboard and verify it opens correctly.

title: Activity News & Announcements Interaction and RSVP
description: Ensure public users can view school activity news cards with announcements details, RSVP to events, and see visual progress bars reflecting attendance.

steps.description: Navigate to the public activity news and announcements page.
Verify a modern card UI lists all upcoming events with summaries.
Select an event/card to view full details.
Ensure event description, date/time, location, and club info are displayed.
Click RSVP button (as a guest) and submit RSVP with valid details.
Check RSVP is accepted and progress bar updates accordingly.
Attempt to RSVP without required details or with invalid input.
Verify proper validation error messages are displayed.
Verify progress bar accurately reflects RSVP counts after submission.

title: User Profile & Settings Security and Updates
description: Test user profile pages to securely update personal information, change passwords, and modify preferences with access control and validation.

steps.description: Login as an authenticated user (any role except GUEST).
Navigate to the user profile and settings page.
Verify the page loads successfully with current user data.
Attempt to update profile information with valid data and save.
Check that changes persist after refresh and are not accessible by unauthorized users.
Change the password with correct current password and new valid password.
Verify password update success and that login works with new password.
Attempt to change password with incorrect current password.
Confirm error message is displayed and password is not changed.
Modify user preferences such as notification settings and save.
Confirm preference changes are applied immediately and persist on reload.
Attempt to access profile/settings page while logged out.
Verify user is redirected to login page.

title: Admin User Management - Batch Operations and Role Assignment
description: Verify admin functionalities for managing user accounts including batch editing roles, bulk deletions, and permission checks to restrict non-admin users.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN user.
Navigate to user management console.
Verify list of users is displayed with roles and statuses.
Select multiple users and change their roles in batch.
Confirm roles are updated correctly and UI reflects changes instantly.
Select multiple users and perform bulk deletion.
Verify confirmation prompts appear and users are removed from the list and database.
Login as a non-admin user attempting to access the user management console.
Confirm access is denied and user is redirected or shown an unauthorized page.

title: System Settings Real-Time Update and Validation
description: Validate that admins can update system settings via admin UI, with real-time effect, input validation, and error handling.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN.
Navigate to system settings console.
Change various settings including security policies and backup configurations with valid inputs.
Verify changes are applied in real-time without requiring site restart.
Input invalid data into configuration fields.
Ensure validation messages appear and invalid changes are rejected.
Reload the page and verify settings persist correctly.

title: Database Schema Migration and Data Integrity
description: Test Prisma migration and db push workflows to apply schema changes, ensuring no data loss or corruption and verifying related API endpoints.

steps.description: Apply a database schema migration using Prisma CLI.
Verify migration executes successfully without errors.
Test data access through API endpoints that rely on changed schema.
Confirm API responses are correct and data is consistent with schema.
Apply database push to update schema without migrations.
Verify schema updates without data loss and system stability is maintained.
Rollback migration where possible and confirm data integrity.

title: API Endpoint Authentication and Specification Compliance
description: Verify that all API endpoints require proper authentication, adhere to request/response schema specifications, and handle invalid inputs gracefully.

steps.description: Make authenticated requests to all protected API endpoints using valid tokens.
Verify responses match expected schemas with correct status codes.
Make unauthenticated requests to protected endpoints.
Confirm access denied errors (401/403) are returned.
Send malformed or invalid requests to API endpoints.
Verify validation errors are returned with detailed messages.

title: UI Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation
description: Confirm all UI components including navigation, forms, and interactive widgets meet accessibility standards for keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility.

steps.description: Using keyboard only, navigate through header navigation, content links, form controls, and footer sitemap.
Ensure focus states are visible and logical tab order is maintained.
Use a screen reader to navigate main pages including resource hub, admin console, and dashboards.
Verify all interactive elements have meaningful accessible names and roles.
Test color contrast ratios on all UI components including icon and color pickers.
Ensure minimum WCAG contrast requirements are met.
Check that error messages and validation feedback are accessible.

title: Logging and Error Monitoring Coverage
description: Test that client, server, and edge runtime errors produce actionable logs and are captured by error monitoring systems.

steps.description: Trigger client-side JavaScript errors by invalid user inputs or actions.
Confirm errors are logged with stack traces and user context.
Trigger server-side errors by calling API endpoints with invalid data or unauthorized access.
Verify server logs include request metadata and error details.
Cause edge runtime errors using Next.js App Router middleware.
Check monitoring catches these errors and sends alerts if configured.

title: End-to-End Workflow Tests with Playwright
description: Run comprehensive Playwright e2e tests covering user login, resource browsing, admin CRUD operations, AI chat assistant, and event RSVP flows across popular browsers.

steps.description: Execute existing Playwright scripts for login/logout flows with all user roles.
Verify test passes and correct UI flow is followed.
Run Playwright tests for resource hub browsing and admin category/resource management.
Confirm all CRUD operations complete successfully with expected UI states.
Execute AI chat assistant interaction test including message sending and error/retry handling.
Perform end-to-end test of event RSVP function and progress bar update.
Ensure tests confirm success states and visual updates.
